2883.name: NINTENDO_NETWORK_CLOSED
2883.message:
This online service is no longer
available.

Sorry for the inconvenience.
2883.long_description: The network has completely shut down.
2883.short_solution: Self host the server or use another hosted instance.
2883.long_solution: Make sure you are loaded to Pretendo Network via SSSL or Inkay and you are logged on a Pretendo Network ID. If the server is not or no longer available on Pretendo Network, self host the instance or use another online service.
